werewolf_killed: Player {n} was killed by the Werewolves.
witch_notice_killed: This night, Player {a} and Player {b} were killed.
witch_use_good_prompt: Do you want to use the good potion? y/n
witch_use_bad_prompt: Do you want to use the another potion? y/n
which_player_save: Which player do you want to save?(use serial number)
player_saved_by_witch: Player {n} was saved by the Witch.
which_player_kill_witch: Which player do you want to kill?(use serial number)
player_killed_by_witch: Player {n} was killed by the Witch.
who_prophesy: Who will you prophesy about?(use serial number)
player_prophesyed: Player {n} was prophesyed by the Prophet.
who_vote: Who will you vote for?(use serial number)
who_kill: Who are you going to kill?(use serial number)
